name: 2D Paintball | An Online Multiplayer Digital Paintball Game
name_original: 2D Paintball | An Online Multiplayer Digital Paintball Game
description:
★ PLAY REAL-TIME COMPETITIVE MULTIPLAYER PAINTBALL, IN 2D! ★ www.2DPaintball.com

2D Paintball is a free-to-play, online multiplayer, high-caliber, strategic, real-time speedball game that you play in your web browser. 2D Paintball has "sim" roots and is meant to be difficult, skill-based, and is much more than meets the eye; read below for more info!

★ HOW-TO / CONTROLS & STRATEGY ★

Check out our detailed How-To-Play for the default controls, tips, tricks, and strategies to help you get a leg up on the others! • How To Play 2D Paintball + Tips and Tricks

★ 2D PAINTBALL FEATURES ★

  • High-speed, Real-time Multiplayer Gun Play! (64+ tickrate server netcode through your browser!)
  • Paintball Field Creator & Field Editor (80+ Maps In Rotation with 100's more made by our players.)
  • • Make an awesome map in our Field Creator and we'll add it to the active map selection pool!
  • Daily PVP & Team Tournaments (Register for tournaments to Win Trophies and bragging rights!)
  • Earn XP to Unlock New Gear (Guns, Hoppers, & Paint.)
  • Customize Your Player (Head, Mask, Jersey, Gun, Hopper, Pods, Pack, and more!)
  • Play in 1v1 - 7v7 Events within Divisions Ranked between D5 - D1, Semi-Pro, & Pro!
  • Shooting modes: Semi-auto, Ramping, Electro, Mechanical, & Pump Paintball Guns
  • "Sightlines" (Hard Mode) - Brings a whole new challenge to the game!
  • Smart / Difficult A.I. Bots - Be careful, this game isn't meant to be easy!
  • • Skilled play is highly rewarded; Play smart, play tight, and shoot fast!

    • ★ MORE INFO / HELP ★

  • If you are finding the game too difficult or are having technical issues, we highly suggest reading the always updated Gameplay Help & Gameplay Smoothness Tips @ www.2DPaintball.com/how-to-play.php
  • • It's worth the read, and will help you better understand the inner workings of the game mechanics, controls, and ideal strategies.
